metadata.name: Didier Comès, Planche 1 Silence
metadata.description: Planche 1, Coll. Fondation Roi Baudouin, 'Silence',  coll. 'Les romans (À suivre)', 1980, ©Casterman

attributes.remuneration: If this NFT is sold on a secondary marketplace, a remuneration of 10% per resale is to be paid on an Ethereum address belonging to Artts (Limited Company with headquarters in Brussels (BE), with VAT number BE.0775.360.392). This address is mentionned in the IPFS directory.
